short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smartwaiver.com - Online Waivers for Smart Companies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Smartwaiver extension with Smart Fill enables you to transfer information from your signed smart waivers to your Point of Sale (POS) or Customer Relationship Management (CRM) System. This saves your staff time and ensures accurate data when adding a new customer record to your database.
